job_title: Digital Marketing Coordinator in Sebring, FL
pros: An organization that is mission-minded in all that they do. They truly take to heart what they do knowing that the people they care for matter. When you have people working together and caring for one another as members of the same mission it makes an immense difference. This organization has giving me a life changing career path, and more than that a clear direction and mission.
cons: Any cons that I can think of are overshadowed by the organization as a whole, it is special. There will always be individuals who make things difficult at times (that's a given) but there is no other organization that I would rather work for right now.

pros: Great Health Insurance Benefits, You meet a lot of great people, when you do well; your immediate supervisors are always recognizing you.
cons: I really enjoy working here, the only 'con' is that the rest of the hospital (nurses, administration, technicians) look down on you like your work is the easiest job on the planet and they don't know why they pay us. If only they knew that our work being accurate is what gets the hospital paid!

pros:
Florida Hospital is advanced many years with electronic computer charting, scanning, physician order entry. This allows staff to provide safe care throughout the entire hospital system.
Florida Hospital is always striving to improve their healthcare practices. Another pro is location, my job is close to home in a quiet community.
cons: Moderate turn over rate. Many nurses come get their initial training at our hospital then move to bigger cities after a couple years. This take many hours and resources from our staff and hospital.

pros: Learning is paramount! I was always attending a meeting of some kind! That can be good or bad, depending on the type of person you are!
cons: I had a serious medical issue and it was a nightmare to get what they wanted in the time that they wanted to considering what was wrong with me! I would have expected that from a company that didn't know what I had gone through, but not them!

review_title: I love my job my team and my patients
